answers.answer: should I eat before I go or not???
If they didn't tell you to fast, then I wouldn't fast.As far as swelling,  try sitting with your feet up.

question: Soo today im going to get blood work to see if I have preeclampsia because my feet get really swollen im 33 goin on 34weeks im really scared im praying for the best ! has anybody had this before or know whats helps swelling go down??
title: preeclampsia,!?
